title: plugout_tt
description: This program connects to AFNI and receives notification whenever the user changes Talairach coordinates.

host.title: Host Name
host.description: Name of the host computer to connect to AFNI on. The default is to connect on the current host using shared memory.

ijk_option.title: IJK Option
ijk_option.description: Get voxel indices from AFNI instead of Talairach coordinates.

verbose.title: Verbose Flag
verbose.description: Enable verbose mode (prints lots of diagnostic messages).

port.title: Port Number
port.description: TCP/IP port number to use. The default is 8001.

name.title: Plugin Name
name.description: String to use as the name that AFNI assigns to this plugout. The default is something silly.

port_offset.title: Port Offset
port_offset.description: Provide a port offset to allow multiple instances of communicating programs to operate on the same computer. Use an integer in the inclusive range [1025 to 65500].

port_offset_quiet.title: Port Offset Quiet
port_offset_quiet.description: Provide a port offset to allow multiple instances of communicating programs to operate on the same computer with quiet output in case of issues. Use an integer in the inclusive range [1025 to 65500].

port_bloc.title: Port Bloc
port_bloc.description: Provide a port offset bloc for easier configuration of multiple instances. PORT_OFFSET_BLOC is an integer between 0 and MAX_BLOC (around 4000).

max_port_bloc.title: Max Port Bloc
max_port_bloc.description: Print the current value of MAX_BLOC and exit. Stay under 2000 for safety.

max_port_bloc_quiet.title: Max Port Bloc Quiet
max_port_bloc_quiet.description: Print the current value of MAX_BLOC quietly and exit.

num_assigned_ports.title: Number of Assigned Ports
num_assigned_ports.description: Print the number of assigned ports used by AFNI, then quit.

num_assigned_ports_quiet.title: Number of Assigned Ports Quiet
num_assigned_ports_quiet.description: Print the number of assigned ports used by AFNI quietly, then quit.
